price: Sε woi nom yε anyame ampa a, anka wͻmma (Amanehunu gya no mu) hͻ. Na emu na wͻn nyinaa bεtena afe bᴐᴐ.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةٗ مَّا وَرَدُوهَاۖ وَكُلّٞ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: law kāna hāulāi ālihatan mā waradūhā wakullun fīhā khālidūna
